Room.Name: Melbourne Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Melbourne Avenue in the southeastern section of town.
Room.LongDescription: You are in the central section of this part of town where numerous shops line the street. On the west side of the road, you can see Othan's Medical Supplies where various healing potions and supplies may be purchased. On the east side of the road is Runfun's Archery College where young warriors are trained in the art of archery and fletchery.
